ygData.subject: Elves and helms
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I haven t seen a wood elf wearing a plate/bronze helm yet so can t comment on it, but something that does look funny is my wood elf bard wearing a
ygData.messageBody:
Well I haven't seen a wood elf wearing a plate/bronze helm yet so can't
comment on it, but something that does look funny is my wood elf bard
wearing a ringmail coif. He looks like a cross between a Vulcan and a
Ferengi.

Galtin
E'ci


> WARNING. bronze and plate look exactly the same except for color. the
> helms on wood elf males and females are hidious. i wear a fine silk
> turbin
> off the sand giant Hatar, looks like cloth so doesn't show on body.
>
>
> I'm saving up now to convert my small bronze helmet into a small steel
> helmet. I just hope it's not as ugly as the bronze one! Every other race
>
> that I've seen gets really cool looking bronze helmets. The wood elf
> version, according to my guildmates, makes me look like a push-pin.
>
